responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "10A11FC448B6F4F70D6EC185BB4105E6", "Entry #82 Petra seems to be approaching his final few days. His injuries are too great and our resources too few. I have to contend with the reality that we will lose our only researcher. The rest of us military knuckleheads are going to be even worse off than ever before. While we can all agree some reinforcements would be helpful, what will they be expecting? When they realize how little progress we\'ve made, fear will get the best of all of us.")
name: CSQ_RVR_0084_FB_MercilessGeneral_Logbook_DLG_5_Response
